title: [GAMEPLAY] Per-Side offset camera update?
body: Hey riot, can we please get an update on the progress of when this is going to be fixed? I just had my first weekend off in 8 months, that I requested off because it was the IP boost and new patch with new shen and everything and I haven't even been able to play a single game because unlocked and semi-locked camera make me motion sick. Please give us an update on if/when per-side offset will be fixed. Thank you.

replies.body: I'd responded to your other post, but just for visibility sake - I'm following up with the team this morning.
Id really like an update myself the bug is pretty game breaking for people who need it, not that they would care about it.
